content.en: Transactional Memory Optimization: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to simplify parallel programming and improve the performance of transactional memory systems. They have investigated various approaches, such as time-based software transactional memory and thread-level speculation based on transactional memory. These algorithms aim to enhance the parallel execution of programs on multi-core processors and reduce aborts, improving overall system performance. Additionally, researchers have developed optimization techniques for irregular applications and explored the possibility of achieving distributed and operation-level wait-free transactional memory.
content.da: Optimering af transaktionel hukommelse: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forenkle parallel programmering og forbedre ydeevnen af transaktionelle hukommelsessystemer. De har undersøgt forskellige tilgange, såsom tidsbaseret software transaktionel hukommelse og tråd-niveau spekulation baseret på transaktionel hukommelse. Disse algoritmer har til formål at forbedre parallel udførelse af programmer på multicore-processorer og reducere afbrydelser, hvilket forbedrer den samlede systemydelse. Derudover har forskere udviklet optimeringsteknikker til uregelmæssige applikationer og undersøgt muligheden for at opnå distribueret og operation-niveau ventefri transaktionel hukommelse.
